definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Yasuhisa Kawamura is Japan's deputy consul general in New York.
sentences.chinese: 川村泰久是日本驻纽约副总领事。

sentences.english: I am going to the Chinese Consulate General at 520, 12th Ave.
sentences.chinese: 我到第12条大街520号的中国总领事馆。

sentences.english: Hello, I am Consul General of Canada in Shanghai Weldon Epp.
sentences.chinese: 大家好，我是加拿大驻上海总领事艾伟敦。

sentences.english: The creativity embedded in the road sign in Redtory has captured the attention of the consul general.
sentences.chinese: 红专厂的创意路牌引起了总领事的兴趣。

sentences.english: Our Consul General will visit Anhui's beautiful Huangshan.
sentences.chinese: 我们的总领事还将访问安徽斑斓的黄山。

sentences.english: It was the Consulate-General of China to Vienna.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻维也纳总领事馆也。

sentences.english: Consul General Camp's first two trips to Yellow Mountain were personal trips.
sentences.chinese: 康总领事的前两次黄山之行都是以个人的名义。

sentences.english: Sixth, China welcomes Brunei to open consulates general in Shanghai and Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 第六，中方欢迎文莱在香港和上海开设总领事馆。

sentences.english: I'm Guergana Guermanoff, Consul General of New Zealand in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我是新西兰驻上海总领事葛甘楠。

sentences.english: Similar protests were also staged outside the Japanese consulate general in Shenyang.
sentences.chinese: 类似的抗议活动还在沈阳总领事馆前举行。

sentences.english: DHU Vice President & Consul Generals were cutting the ribbon on the Opening Ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 刘春红副校长与各国驻沪总领事共同为开幕剪彩。

sentences.english: How much does Consul General know about Zhongshan City?
sentences.chinese: 贵馆总领事对中山市的了解程度有多少？

sentences.english: Introducing UK &Chinese Speakers by official of the British Council.
sentences.chinese: 英国总领事馆文化教育处官员介绍中英双方专家。

sentences.english: The Consulate-General in Guangzhou does not welcome direct visa applications.
sentences.chinese: 广州的总领事馆不接受直接的签证申请。

sentences.english: Mr. Thomas Christensen, the Consul General of Denmark gave the opening speech.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦王国驻广州总领事科瑞德先生做开幕式致辞。

sentences.english: In New York, people left flowers outside the Polish Consulate General.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约，人们在波兰总领事馆外面放下一束束花。

definition: minister/diplomat performing ambassadorial role in Qing times, before regular diplomatic relations
consulate general/same as 總領事館|总领事馆[zong3 ling3 shi4 guan3]
